oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Demonstrators chanting along to music
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: El Dik, Dina Bashir
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A helicoptor flies over the crowd as demonstrators talk and take photos. Photos and videos taken in Tahrir Square from 1st Feb./4th. Feb/6th Feb./8th Feb./10th Feb./11th Feb./18th Feb./ and so on.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demontrations; Egypt; Revolutions
Crowds; Flags; Musical instruments
